overview: Adarei Man (I Love) (Sinhalese: ආදරෙයි මං) is a 2018 Sri Lankan Sinhala romance film directed by Prageeth Rathnayake as his maiden direction and produced by Jagath Chandana for Romeo’s Eye Picture.  It is the love tale of a rich but kind hearted boy named Pavan and his relation with a middle class girl named Malmi
title: I Love
